page.title: 16BARNARD CASTLE CARNIVAL
page.content: The annual Barnard Castle Meet is a three day programme of fun and entertainment in the form of races, shows, displays and competitions. It starts with the crowning of the Meet Queen at a fair in the castle grounds , where stalls and sideshows are organised by local clubs and groups. Then follows the Boat Race on the River Tees in anything but a recognised boat.This provides plenty of thrills and spills!It's a Knockout, Pet Show,Pram Race and a Fun Run are among other attractions. The climax to the weekend is the Carnival Procession ,led through the town by the local brass band,Mayor and Carnival Queen with her attendants.Throughout the weekend,entertainment can be found at the Fun Fair in the town centre. Proceeds from collections taken during the weekend,go to local charities.
